title: My Entire Class Was Summoned to Another World except for Me - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Accelerated Growth   Adapted to Manga   Angels   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Calm Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Dragons   Evil Gods   Game Elements   Godly Powers   Gods   Heroes   Hiding True Abilities   Lazy Protagonist   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Multiple POV   Naive Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Parallel Worlds   Polygamy   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Skill Assimilation   Skill Creation   Sleeping   Strong to Stronger   Tsundere   Youkai
author: Southernterrace   サザンテラス
description:
A god of a different world had abruptly appeared in my classroom and semi-forcibly summoned the entire class to his world.ーーーーexcept for me, Kamiya Yato.

Because I was taking a seat in the corner of the class, the round summoning magic circle didn’t reach me and I ended up staying here on earth but with new skills. After I made it through a whole year full of police interviews and journalism reports, I finally graduated to my first year of high school.>
